text.text_translated: Asteroids are rocks in space. Some asteroids could be dangerous. They are called 'Potentially Hazardous Asteroids'. These are rocks that pass close to the Earth's path. They pass less than 7.5 million kilometres from this path. NASA made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids. But NASA does not think they will be a danger for the next 100 years. NASA has technology to watch these rocks. NASA can predict if a rock will hit the Earth. Then, NASA can send two things into space to stop it.
